structure.unit: STATE AND REGIONAL MENTAL HEALTH PROGRAMS

law.catch_line: Applicability of notice provisions to pre-existing closure announcements -- Delay of hearings.
law.text: For any facility that the cabinet has announced plans for closure prior to April 5, 2000, the cabinet shall be subject to the notice provisions of KRS 210.045 within ten (10) days of April 5, 2000. The cabinet shall delay proceedings toward closure until the proceedings for all hearings permitted under KRS 210.045 have been completed.
law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 318, sec. 3, effective April 5, 2000.
